modified.change: Changed all tests in this test-set that don't require 1.0-compatibility to say version='2.0'

test-case.name: string-003
test-case.description: Test of 'namespace-uri()'. note, this relies on namespace-uri taking the first element in the sequence, which only works under backwards-compatible mode

test-case.name: string-022
test-case.description: Test of 'generate-id()' - make sure same node generates same ID.

test-case.name: string-050
test-case.description: Test of 'starts-with()' function. changed 29 May 2001 to do something useful...

test-case.name: string-051
test-case.description: Test of 'starts-with()' function. changed 29 May 2001 to do something useful

test-case.name: string-089
test-case.description: Test of 'substring()' function. test changed 29 May 2001 to do something useful...

test-case.name: string-090
test-case.description: Test of 'substring()' function on an empty sequence.

test-case.name: string-094
test-case.description: Test of 'substring()' function with Unicode surrogate pairs.

test-case.name: string-095
test-case.description: Test that quotes can be doubled in string literals (XPath 2.0) .

result.assert-xml: He isn'tHe said "boo"

test-case.name: string-114
test-case.description: Test of 'concat()' function. spec changed to allow a numeric argument in 2.0 mode (21 Jun 2004)

test-case.name: string-124
test-case.description: PURPOSE Test string() with zero arguments: returns the string value of the context node

test-case.name: string-125
test-case.description: PURPOSE Test string-length() with zero arguments: returns the string length of the context node

test-case.name: string-126
test-case.description: PURPOSE Test upper-case() applied to an empty sequence

test-case.name: string-127
test-case.description: PURPOSE Test lower-case() applied to an empty sequence

test-case.name: string-128
test-case.description: PURPOSE Test substring() with start lt 0 and (start+len) lt 0

test-case.name: string-132
test-case.description: Test of 'string-length()' with a Unicode surrogate pair

test-case.name: string-134
test-case.description: Test of lower-case() applied to Latin-1 characters

test-case.name: string-135
test-case.description: Test of upper-case() applied to Latin-1 characters

test-case.name: string-136
test-case.description: Test of whitespace normalization in xs:string subtypes
